com.mapbox.services.android.geocoder.ui

Class GeocoderAutoCompleteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • android.widget.EditText
          • android.widget.AutoCompleteTextView
            • com.mapbox.services.android.geocoder.ui.GeocoderAutoCompleteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, android.widget.Filter.FilterListener

    public class GeocoderAutoCompleteView
extends android.widget.AutoCompleteTextView
    An editable text view that shows geocoder result suggestions automatically while the user is typing. The list of suggestions is displayed in a drop down menu from which the user can choose an item and you can listen to and act upon which item they chose
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    Android AutoCompleteTextView, Mapbox example

    • Method Detail

      • setAccessToken

        public void setAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken)
        You'll need to have a Mapbox access token to use the geocoding API within MAS.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Your Mapbox access token
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Mapbox access token

      • setType

        public void setType(java.lang.String type)
        Configure the geocoder type, pass in one of the constants found within GeocodingCriteria.
        Parameters:
        type - String containing "place", "poi", "neighborhood", etc.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Geocoding API documentation

      • setBbox

        public void setBbox(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position northeast,
                    com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position southwest)
        Bounding box within which to limit results.
        Parameters:
        northeast - The top right hand corner of your bounding box when the map is pointed north.
        southwest - The bottom left hand corner of your bounding box when the map is pointed north.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • setBbox

        public void setBbox(double minX,
                    double minY,
                    double maxX,
                    double maxY)
        Bounding box within which to limit results.
        Parameters:
        minX - Bottom of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        minY - Left of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        maxX - Top of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        maxY - Right of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • setProximity

        public void setProximity(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position)
        Location around which to bias geocoder results.
        Parameters:
        position - Position coordinate.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Geocoding API documentation

      • setOnFeatureListener

        public void setOnFeatureListener(GeocoderAutoCompleteView.OnFeatureListener onFeatureListener)
        Sets the listener that will be notified when the user clicks an item in the drop down list.
        Parameters:
        onFeatureListener - the item click listener.
        Since:
        1.0.0
